column5: I am thinking of heading down to Myrtle Beach in about two weeks to do a bit of pier fishing (about the end of March) (the whities should be running really well by then) and perhaps dig a pail or two of clams and oysters. Anyone interested? Flexable travel dates and length of stay.

Glad you got a wing man Cliff. Once we are Â getting into April I just have too big of a "To do" list or I would have been happy for a road trip. Enjoy yourselves and good luck with the fishing and digging. And don't forget your camera.
Enjoy and safe travels my friend!
Hey, I think that brings us full circle. If I remember correctly, thatâ€™s where you were right before getting ready to high tail it back to Ontario before the borders closed about two years ago.
